Song.Title: Because I'm Stupid
Song.Lyrics: ne meolineun neomuna nappaseo. neo hanabakk-e nan moleugo daleun salam-eul bogoissneun neon ileon nae ma-eumdo moleugessji neoui halue nalan-eobsgessji tto chueogjocha eobsjiman¬ neoman balaman bogoissneun nan jakku nunmul-i heuligoiss-eo neoui dwis moseub-eul boneungeosdo nan haengbog-iya ajig aui ma-eum-eul mollado kkeutnae seuchideus-i gado niga neomu bogosip-eun nal-eneun neomu gyeondigi himdeun nal-eneun neoleul salanghanda ibga-e maemdol-a honjadasi tto crying for you honjadasi ttomissing for you Baby I love you. I’m waiting for you neouihalue nan eobsgessji ttogieogjocha eobsgessjiman neoman balaman bogoissneun na honja chueog-eul mandeulgoiss-eo naegen salang-ilan aleumdaun sangcheogat-a neoui yeppeun misoleul boado hamkke nan usjido moshae niga neomu saeng-gagnaneun nal-en gaseum siligo seulpeun nalleneun niga bodasipda ibga-emaemdol-a honja dasi ttocrying for you honjadasi ttomissing for you Baby I love you. I’m waiting for you Bye bye never say goodbye ileohge jabji moshajiman I need you amu maldo moshae. I want you balaedo dasi balaedo niga neomu bogosip-eun nal-en neomu gyeondigi himdeun nal-eneun neoleul salanghanda ibga-e maemdol-a honja dasi ttocrying for you niga neomu saeng-gagnaneun nal-en gaseum siligo seulpeun nal-eneun niga bogosipda ibga-e maemdol-a honja dasi ttocrying for you honjadasi ttomissing for you Baby I love you. I’m waiting for you
